content: Have there been any (possibly successful) attempts to formalize random graphs? E.g. the E-R model.
LeanCamCombi contains a formalization of the ER model.
It's not greatly developed right now because I need to refactor Probability.Independence.Basic quite a bit to make my statements true again.
What kind of refactor do you need?
Some easy generalization like Measurable -> AEMeasurable or a more impactful change?
Vasily Ilin has marked this topic as resolved.
